scripts.db:console: docker compose run postgres psql -h postgres -U postgres -d express_app_dev
scripts.docker:db:migrate: docker compose run backend npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.docker:db:migrate:reset: docker compose run backend npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.docker:seed:dev: docker compose run backend npx ts-node scripts/seed/dev.ts
scripts.rebuild:be: docker compose build backend && docker compose rm --force --stop backend && docker compose up -d backend
scripts.watch: watchy --no-init-spawn --debounce 2 --watch src -- docker compose restart backend
